hero.title: Transform your style in our cosmetic
hero.subtitle: Welcome to our studio website
hero.promoText: Book your appointment now and get 20% discount!

about.subtitle: Find your unique style
about.title: About us
about.description1: In addition to professional hairdressing services, we also offer body care in the areas of manicure, pedicure, cosmetics and inner health care in a natural way.
about.description2: We work with professional hair cosmetics from renowned brands and also offer hair cosmetics sales for home care. We provide all hairdressing services for ladies, gentlemen and children. We focus on all possible trends.

reservationBanner.title: Ready for your transformation?
reservationBanner.subtitle: Pamper yourself in our luxury studio. Book your appointment today and get an unforgettable experience.
reservationBanner.additionalInfo: 20% off first visit • Flexible cancellation • Express confirmation

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: We'd love to see you at our studio. Contact us or visit us in person.
contact.mapDescription: Easily accessible by public transport, parking available nearby

kadernictvi.title: Hairdressing
kadernictvi.disclaimer: Prices are indicative, final price is determined by the hairdresser depending on hair length, products used and additional care. Complete detailed price list available at the studio.

complete.title: Complete Facial Treatment
complete.description: Makeup removal, exfoliating massage, toning, eyebrow shaping, face, décolletage and trapezius muscle massage, deep cleansing, mask application, final care

problematic.title: Problematic Skin Treatment
problematic.description: Makeup removal, toning, eyebrow shaping, skin softening, deep cleansing, disinfection, toning, mask application, final care

chocolate.title: Chocolate Relaxing Treatment
chocolate.description: Makeup removal, coffee peeling, eyebrow shaping, chocolate massage of face, décolletage and trapezius muscles, chocolate mask application, toning, final care

eyeArea.title: Eye Area Micromassage
eyeArea.description: Makeup removal, eye area micromassage with anti-aging effect, final care

massage.title: Massage

description.title: About Our Massages
description.intro: Treat yourself to deep relaxation and harmony through our wide range of massages that care for both body and mind.
description.specialization: I specialize in foot sole reflexology and reflexotherapy, which help restore balance in the body and support self-healing processes.
description.additional: I also offer foot massages for tension relief and regeneration, as well as sports-relaxation reconditioning massages to improve mobility and reduce muscle pain. For those who prefer a gentler approach, Assyrian non-contact massages or crystal therapy - massages using the healing power of crystals - are ideal.
description.conclusion: Whether you're looking for stress relief, regeneration, or harmonization, I'll be happy to help you find a massage tailored to your needs.

massage.footer: I look forward to your visit

description.title: Pedicure for Everyone
description.intro: Choose from various types of pedicure from wellness and comfort care to professional medical or podiatric pedicure.
description.clientInfo: I care for women, men, seniors, and diabetics.
description.homeService: If you prefer the comfort of home, I'll be happy to come directly to you. Give your feet the best care and book today.

types.title: Types of Pedicure
types.relax: Relax Pedicure - combined pedicure with peeling
types.comfort: Comfort Pedicure - combined pedicure with massage
types.medical: Medical Pedicure - corns, ingrown nails, callused skin
types.wellness: Wellness Pedicure - combined ped. incl. peeling, massage, polishing
types.mobile: Mobile Pedicure - in the comfort of home, office, nursing home, senior home

footer.message: I look forward to your visit

lymphatic.title: Lymphatic Treatment

single.title: 1 procedure
single.description: procedure duration 30 min + free body diagnostics

lymphatic.footer: I look forward to your visit

client1.name: Eva Tinková
client1.text: I discovered Studio Safira by chance when I was (as always) urgently looking for a hairdresser. Lucka found me an appointment the very next working day and what's more — she gave me perhaps the most beautiful and fullest highlights I've ever had on my head, and I've had many in over 20 years.

client2.name: Marie Mírková
client2.text: Today I unexpectedly visited the hairdressing salon directly to Mrs. Lucia Beranová for the first time. Very pleasant and friendly environment. I left enthusiastic with a hairstyle and color exactly according to my wishes, I warmly recommend the salon!

client3.name: Jana Janeček
client3.text: I was in the salon for the first time and definitely not the last time. I am very satisfied with both the cut and the highlights. Lucka is really nice and skilled hairdresser and one feels comfortable in the salon and the result is worth it! Definitely don't be put off by the website 😊

client4.name: Zuzana Slabyhoudova
client4.text: Absolutely excellent hairdresser (one of the absolute best I've ever met)! Not only is she very skilled and dexterous, but she's also great as a person and it's a joy to go to her. I highly recommend! I'm already looking forward to next time :) ZS P.S.: Last time she created this luxurious cut for me, I can't help but share it.

warningBanner.title: Important Reservation Information
warningBanner.cancelationPolicy: You can cancel your reservation up to 24 hours before the appointment starts.
warningBanner.confirmationTime: You will receive confirmation within 1 hour of submission by email.
warningBanner.arrivalTime: Please arrive 5 minutes before your appointment time.
warningBanner.contactInfo: If you have any issues, contact us at +420 607 191 088.

messages.success: Reservation submitted successfully! Confirmation will be sent to your email within 1 hour.
